translations.es: ENGRANDEZCAN AL SEÑOR Y BENDIGAN SU NOMBRE

856d974d-6f0a-4fef-9b0c-cff7378efe67.translation: The angel of the Lord is encamped around those who fear him

translations.en: The angel of the Lord is encamped around those who fear him
translations.cs: ANDĚL HOSPODINŮV SE KLADE TÁBOREM KOLEM TĚCH, KDO SE HO BOJÍ
translations.ru: АНГЕЛ ГОСПОДЕНЬ ОПОЛЧАЕТСЯ ВОКРУГ БОЯЩИХСЯ ЕГО
translations.es: EL ÁNGEL DEL SEÑOR ACAMPA ALREDEDOR DE LOS QUE LE TEMEN

856d974d-6f0a-4fef-9b0c-cff7378efe67.translation: and he saves them, he saves them

translations.en: and he saves them, he saves them
translations.es: Y LOS LIBRA, Y LOS LIBRA

856d974d-6f0a-4fef-9b0c-cff7378efe67.translation: Taste and see that the Lord is good
856d974d-6f0a-4fef-9b0c-cff7378efe67.originalText: טעמו וראו כי טוב כי טוב אדוני
856d974d-6f0a-4fef-9b0c-cff7378efe67.transliteration: tamu u'ru ki tov, ki tov Adonai

translations.en: Taste and see that the Lord is good
translations.cs: OKUSTE A VIZTE, ŽE HOSPODIN JE DOBRÝ
translations.ru: ВКУСИТЕ И УВИДИТЕ, КАК БЛАГ, КАК БЛАГ ГОСПОДЬ
translations.es: GUSTAD Y VED QUE BUENO, QUE BUENO ES EL SEÑOR

856d974d-6f0a-4fef-9b0c-cff7378efe67.translation: blessed is the man who takes shelter in him

translations.en: blessed is the man who takes shelter in him
translations.cs: BLAZE MUŽI, KTERÝ SE V NĚM UKRÝVÁ
translations.es: BIENAVENTURADO EL HOMBRE QUE SE REFUGIA EN ÉL

a6b35f30-e3cb-4bb0-af5c-16de5645b5be.translation: I have hidden your word in my heart

translations.en: I have hidden your word in my heart
translations.cs: VE SVÉM SRDCI UCHOVÁVÁM TVÉ SLOVO
translations.ru: В СЕРДЦЕ МОЁМ СОКРЫЛ Я СЛОВО ТВОЁ
translations.es: EN MI CORAZÓN HE GUARDADO TU PALABRA

a6b35f30-e3cb-4bb0-af5c-16de5645b5be.translation: that I might not sin against you.

translations.en: that I might not sin against you.
translations.es: PARA NO PECAR CONTRA TI

translations.en: Blessed are you Lord
translations.es: BENDITO ERES TÚ, SEÑOR

translations.en: teach me your law
translations.es: ENSÉÑAME TUS ESTATUTOS

translations.en: With my lips I recount
translations.es: CON MIS LABIOS HE PROCLAMADO

a6b35f30-e3cb-4bb0-af5c-16de5645b5be.translation: all the laws that come from your mouth

translations.en: all the laws that come from your mouth
translations.es: TODOS LOS JUICIOS DE TU BOCA

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: The Lord of the heavens He will give us success

translations.en: The Lord of the heavens He will give us success
translations.cs: BŮH NEBES, ON NÁM DÁ ZDAR
translations.es: EL DIOS DE LOS CIELOS NOS DARÁ ÉXITO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: And we Your servants will arise and build

translations.en: And we Your servants will arise and build
translations.cs: A MY TVOJI SLUŽEBNÍCI VSTANEME A BUDEME STAVĚT
translations.ru: И МЫ, РАБЫ ЕГО, ВОССТАНЕМ И БУДЕМ СТРОИТЬ
translations.es: Y NOSOTROS SUS SIERVOS NOS LEVANTAREMOS Y EDIFICAREMOS

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: There is no place for fear and no time to waste
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.originalText: אין מקום לפחד, אין זמן לבזבז
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.transliteration: ein makom le'pakhad ein zman le'bazbez

translations.en: There is no place for fear and no time to waste
translations.cs: NENÍ MÍSTO PRO STRACH, NENÍ ČAS K PLÝTVÁNÍ
translations.ru: НЕТ МЕСТА ДЛЯ СТРАХА, НЕТ ВРЕМЕНИ НА ПУСТОЕ
translations.es: NO HAY LUGAR PARA EL TEMOR NI TIEMPO QUE PERDER

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert

translations.en: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert
translations.cs: NA POUŠTI HLAS VOLAJÍCÍ, ZDE NA POUŠTI
translations.ru: В ПУСТЫНЕ ГОЛОС ВЗЫВАЕТ, ЗДЕСЬ В ПУСТЫНЕ
translations.es: EN EL DESIERTO, UNA VOZ CLAMA AQUÍ EN EL DESIERTO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: Build up a highway straighten for Him a path
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.originalText: סולו לו דרך, ישרו לו מסילה
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.transliteration: solu lo derekh yashru lo mesila

translations.en: Build up a highway straighten for Him a path
translations.cs: VYBUDUJTE MU CESTU, VYROVNEJTE MU STEZKU
translations.ru: ПРОЛОЖИТЕ ЕМУ ПУТЬ, ВЫРОВНЯЙТЕ ЕМУ ДОРОГУ
translations.es: PREPARADLE UN CAMINO, ENDEREZADLE UNA SENDA

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: Remove every obstacle, for He is coming soon
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.originalText: הרימו כל מכשול, כי הנה הוא כבר בא
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.transliteration: harimu kol mikhshol ki hine hu kvar ba

translations.en: Remove every obstacle, for He is coming soon
translations.cs: ODSTRAŇTE KAŽDOU PŘEKÁŽKU, NEBOŤ HLE, ON UŽ PŘICHÁZÍ
translations.ru: УБЕРИТЕ ВСЕ ПРЕГРАДЫ, ИБО ОН УЖЕ ГРЯДЁТ
translations.es: QUITEN TODO OBSTÁCULO, PORQUE ÉL YA VIENE

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: Awake every sleeper, it's time to wake up

translations.en: Awake every sleeper, it's time to wake up
translations.cs: PROBUĎTE KAŽDÉHO SPÍCÍHO, JE ČAS SE PROBUDIT
translations.es: DESPIERTEN A TODO DORMIDO, ES HORA DE DESPERTAR

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert

translations.en: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert
translations.cs: NA POUŠTI HLAS VOLAJÍCÍ, ZDE NA POUŠTI
translations.ru: В ПУСТЫНЕ ГОЛОС ВЗЫВАЕТ, ЗДЕСЬ В ПУСТЫНЕ
translations.es: EN EL DESIERTO, UNA VOZ CLAMA AQUÍ EN EL DESIERTO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: We are all waiting with anticipation

translations.en: We are all waiting with anticipation
translations.es: TODOS ESPERAMOS CON EXPECTACIÓN

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: That You would reveal yourself in the fullness of Your glory

translations.en: That You would reveal yourself in the fullness of Your glory
translations.cs: ŽE SE NÁM ZJEVÍŠ V PLNOSTI SVÉ SLÁVY
translations.ru: ЧТО ТЫ ЯВИШЬ СЕБЯ ВО ВСЕЙ ПОЛНОТЕ СЛАВЫ
translations.es: QUE TE REVELES EN LA PLENITUD DE TU GLORIA

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: Then they will hear The voice of the Lord spoke

translations.en: Then they will hear The voice of the Lord spoke
translations.es: ENTONCES OIRÁN, LA VOZ DEL SEÑOR HABLÓ

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert

translations.en: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert
translations.cs: NA POUŠTI HLAS VOLAJÍCÍ, ZDE NA POUŠTI
translations.ru: В ПУСТЫНЕ ГОЛОС ВЗЫВАЕТ, ЗДЕСЬ В ПУСТЫНЕ
translations.es: EN EL DESIERTO, UNA VOZ CLAMA AQUÍ EN EL DESIERTO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the desert, in the dry land

translations.en: In the desert, in the dry land
translations.es: EN EL DESIERTO, EN LA TIERRA ÁRIDA

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: On the mountain and on the plains

translations.en: On the mountain and on the plains
translations.es: EN LOS MONTES Y EN LOS VALLES

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: A voice calling in the high places

translations.en: A voice calling in the high places
translations.es: UNA VOZ CLAMA TAMBIÉN EN LAS ALTURAS

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: A voice that breaks the silence

translations.en: A voice that breaks the silence
translations.es: UNA VOZ QUE ROMPE EL SILENCIO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the houses and on the streets

translations.en: In the houses and on the streets
translations.es: EN LAS CASAS Y EN LAS CALLES

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the days and in the nights

translations.en: In the days and in the nights
translations.es: EN LOS DÍAS Y EN LAS NOCHES

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the secret place

translations.en: In the secret place
translations.es: EN EL LUGAR SECRETO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: And also on the highest rooftops

translations.en: And also on the highest rooftops
translations.es: Y TAMBIÉN EN LOS TECHOS MÁS ALTOS

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert

translations.en: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert
translations.cs: NA POUŠTI HLAS VOLAJÍCÍ, ZDE NA POUŠTI
translations.ru: В ПУСТЫНЕ ГОЛОС ВЗЫВАЕТ, ЗДЕСЬ В ПУСТЫНЕ
translations.es: EN EL DESIERTO, UNA VOZ CLAMA AQUÍ EN EL DESIERTO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: If it is our portion to suffer, we will suffer with joy
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.originalText: ואם חלקנו הוא לסבול אז בשמחה
93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.transliteration: ve'im khelkeinu hu li'sbol az be'simkha

translations.en: If it is our portion to suffer, we will suffer with joy
translations.cs: A JESTLI JE NAŠÍM ÚDĚLEM TRPĚT, PAK S RADOSTÍ
translations.ru: И ЕСЛИ НАШ УДЕЛ — СТРАДАТЬ, ТО С РАДОСТЬЮ
translations.es: Y SI NOS TOCA SUFRIR, SUFRIREMOS CON GOZO

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: And if we battle, we will battle in love

translations.en: And if we battle, we will battle in love
translations.cs: A JESTLI BOJUJEME, TAK V LÁSCE
translations.ru: И ЕСЛИ СРАЖАТЬСЯ — ТО В ЛЮБВИ
translations.es: Y SI LUCHAMOS, LUCHAREMOS CON AMOR

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: There is no victory in life without a war

translations.en: There is no victory in life without a war
translations.cs: V ŽIVOTĚ NENÍ VÍTĚZSTVÍ BEZ BOJE
translations.ru: НЕТ ПОБЕДЫ В ЖИЗНИ БЕЗ БИТВЫ
translations.es: EN LA VIDA NO HAY VICTORIA SIN BATALLA

93cb7374-6e93-434d-bda0-702715c5ba93.translation: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert

translations.en: In the desert, a voice crying here in the desert
translations.cs: NA POUŠTI HLAS VOLAJÍCÍ, ZDE NA POUŠTI
translations.ru: В ПУСТЫНЕ ГОЛОС ВЗЫВАЕТ, ЗДЕСЬ В ПУСТЫНЕ
translations.es: EN EL DESIERTO, UNA VOZ CLAMA AQUÍ EN EL DESIERTO

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: In the hidden place I was made, for i was wonderfully made

translations.en: In the hidden place I was made, for i was wonderfully made
translations.cs: V SKRYTOSTI JSEM BYL UTVOŘEN, NEBOŤ JSEM PODIVUHODNĚ STVOŘEN
translations.ru: В СОКРОВЕННОМ МЕСТЕ Я БЫЛ СОЗДАН, ИБО ДИВНО Я УСТРОЕН
translations.es: EN LO SECRETO FUI FORMADO, PORQUE MARAVILLOSAMENTE FUI HECHO

translations.en: Your wonderful works
translations.es: MARAVILLOSAS SON TUS OBRAS

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: In the hidden place I was woven, in the darkness my form was completed

translations.en: In the hidden place I was woven, in the darkness my form was completed
translations.cs: V SKRYTOSTI JSEM BYL TKANÝ, V TEMNOTĚ JSEM BYL DOKONČEN
translations.ru: В СОКРОВЕННОМ МЕСТЕ Я БЫЛ СОТКАН, ВО ТЬМЕ МОЙ ОБЛИК БЫЛ ЗАВЕРШЁН
translations.es: EN LO SECRETO FUI TEJIDO, EN LA OSCURIDAD FUI COMPLETADO

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: but nothing was hidden from You, my God

translations.en: but nothing was hidden from You, my God
translations.cs: ALE NIC NEBYLO SKRYTO PŘED TEBOU, MŮJ BOŽE
translations.ru: НО НИЧТО НЕ СОКРЫТО ОТ ТЕБЯ, БОГ МОЙ
translations.es: NADA FUE ESCONDIDO DE TI, DIOS MÍO

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: You purchased my most inward parts You moved me in the belly of my mother
f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.originalText: אתה קנית כליותי, תסוכני בבטן אימי
f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.transliteration: ata kanita kiliotai, tesukeni be'veten imi

translations.en: You purchased my most inward parts You moved me in the belly of my mother
translations.cs: TY JSI STVOŘIL MÉ NEJNITERNĚJŠÍ NITRO, PŘIKRYL JSI MĚ V LŮNĚ MÉ MATKY
translations.ru: ТЫ УСТРОИЛ ВНУТРЕННОСТИ МОИ, ТЫ СОТКАЛ МЕНЯ ВО ЧРЕВЕ МАТЕРИ МОЕЙ
translations.es: TÚ FORMASTE MIS ENTRAÑAS, ME CUBRISTE EN EL VIENTRE DE MI MADRE

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: Your eyes saw my unformed body, In Your book all my days were written
f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.originalText: גלמי ראו עינך, על ספרך יכתבו כל ימי
f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.transliteration: golmi rau eneikha, al sifrekha ikatevu kol yamai

translations.en: Your eyes saw my unformed body, In Your book all my days were written
translations.cs: TVÉ OČI VIDĚLY MÉ BEZTVARÉ TĚLO, V TVÉ KNIZE JSOU ZAPSÁNY VŠECHNY MÉ DNY
translations.ru: ОЧИ ТВОИ ВИДЕЛИ ЗАРОДЫШ МОЙ, В КНИГЕ ТВОЕЙ ЗАПИСАНЫ ВСЕ ДНИ МОИ
translations.es: TUS OJOS VIERON MI CUERPO SIN FORMA, EN TU LIBRO FUERON ESCRITOS TODOS MIS DÍAS

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: If darkness would cover me, and night would separate me from light

translations.en: If darkness would cover me, and night would separate me from light
translations.cs: KDYBY MĚ PŘIKRYLA TEMNOTA A NOC BYLA MÝM SVĚTLEM
translations.ru: ЕСЛИ ТЬМА ПОКРОЕТ МЕНЯ И НОЧЬ ОТДЕЛИТ МЕНЯ ОТ СВЕТА
translations.es: SI LA OSCURIDAD ME CUBRIERA, Y LA NOCHE ME SEPARARA DE LA LUZ

translations.en: darkness could not darken You
translations.es: LA OSCURIDAD NO PODRÍA OSCURECERTE

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: For the night would shine like the day, as darkness so is the light

translations.en: For the night would shine like the day, as darkness so is the light
translations.cs: NOC BY ZÁŘILA JAKO DEN, TMA JAKO SVĚTLO
translations.ru: КАК ДЕНЬ ЗАСИЯЕТ НОЧЬ, КАК ТЬМА — ТАК И СВЕТ
translations.es: LA NOCHE BRILLARÍA COMO EL DÍA, LA OSCURIDAD ES COMO LA LUZ

f09af319-d252-4f0d-b609-207863937165.translation: and nothing is hidden from You, my Lord

translations.en: and nothing is hidden from You, my Lord
translations.cs: A NIC NENÍ SKRYTO PŘED TEBOU, MŮJ PANE
translations.ru: И НИЧТО НЕ СОКРЫТО ОТ ТЕБЯ, ГОСПОДЬ МОЙ
translations.es: Y NADA ESTÁ ESCONDIDO DE TI, MI SEÑOR

4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.translation: Blessed are you Lord, God of Israel our father
4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.originalText: בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה אֲדוֹנָי, אֱלוֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל אָבִינוּ.
4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.transliteration: baruh ata adonai, elohe israel avinu

translations.en: Blessed are you Lord, God of Israel our father
translations.cs: POŽEHNANÝ JSI, PANE, BOŽE IZRAELE, NÁŠ OTČE
translations.ru: БЛАГОСЛОВЕН ТЫ, ГОСПОДЬ, БОГ ИЗРАИЛЯ, ОТЕЦ НАШ
translations.es: BENDITO ERES TÚ SEÑOR, DIOS DE ISRAEL NUESTRO PADRE

4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.translation: Blessed are you Lord, God of Israel our father, from age to age
4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.originalText: בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה אֲדוֹנָי, מֵעוֹלָם וְעַד עוֹלָם
4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.transliteration: baruh ata adonai, meolam vead olam

translations.en: Blessed are you Lord, God of Israel our father, from age to age
translations.cs: POŽEHNANÝ JSI, PANE, OD VĚKŮ AŽ NA VĚKY
translations.ru: БЛАГОСЛОВЕН ТЫ, ГОСПОДЬ, ОТ ВЕКА И ДО ВЕКА
translations.es: BENDITO ERES TÚ SEÑOR, DESDE LA ETERNIDAD Y HASTA LA ETERNIDAD

4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.translation: To you be the greatness, the might and the glory
4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.originalText: לְךָ הַגְּדֻלָה לְךָ הַגְּבוּרָה, לְךָ הַתִּפְאֶרֶת אֲדוֹנָי
4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.transliteration: leha agdula leha agvura leha atifert adonai

translations.en: To you be the greatness, the might and the glory
translations.cs: TOBĚ PATŘÍ VELIKOST, TOBĚ PATŘÍ SÍLA, TOBĚ PATŘÍ SLÁVA, PANE
translations.ru: ТЕБЕ ВЕЛИЧИЕ, ТЕБЕ МОГУЩЕСТВО, ТЕБЕ СЛАВА, ГОСПОДЬ
translations.es: TUYA ES LA GRANDEZA, TUYO EL PODER, TUYA LA GLORIA, SEÑOR

translations.en: to you be eternity
translations.es: TUYA ES LA ETERNIDAD, SEÑOR

4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.translation: all the glory and the honour, Lord

translations.en: all the glory and the honour, Lord
translations.cs: TOBĚ PATŘÍ NÁDHERA A VZNEŠENOST, PANE
translations.es: TUYA ES LA HONRA Y LA MAJESTAD, SEÑOR

4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.translation: In your hands the is strength and power

translations.en: In your hands the is strength and power
translations.cs: V TVÝCH RUKOU JE SÍLA, V TVÝCH RUKOU JE MOC
translations.ru: В РУКАХ ТВОИХ СИЛА, В РУКАХ ТВОИХ МОГУЩЕСТВО
translations.es: EN TUS MANOS HAY FUERZA, EN TUS MANOS HAY PODER

translations.en: to strengthen and empower
translations.es: PARA ENGRANDECER Y FORTALECER A TODOS

translations.en: you reign above all
translations.es: TÚ, SEÑOR, REINAS SOBRE TODO

4d87092d-a90b-47ad-a6d7-450895ed22ed.translation: you reign above all, to you be the kingdom

translations.en: you reign above all, to you be the kingdom
translations.es: TUYO ES EL REINO, SEÑOR, EL REINO

8a08bbb5-e197-4faf-90dc-798562ed2f2b.translation: Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord, Haleluya

translations.en: Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord, Haleluya
translations.cs: POŽEHNANÝ, KDO PŘICHÁZÍ VE JMÉNU PÁNA, HALELUJA
translations.ru: БЛАГОСЛОВЕН ГРЯДУЩИЙ ВО ИМЯ ГОСПОДНЕ, АЛЛИЛУЙЯ
translations.es: BENDITO EL QUE VIENE EN EL NOMBRE DEL SEÑOR, ALELUYA

8a08bbb5-e197-4faf-90dc-798562ed2f2b.translation: Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord

translations.en: Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord
translations.cs: POŽEHNANÝ, KDO PŘICHÁZÍ VE JMÉNU PÁNA
translations.es: BENDITO EL QUE VIENE EN EL NOMBRE DEL SEÑOR

translations.en: Hallelujah
translations.es: ALELUYA

translations.en: Lord put your blood
translations.es: SEÑOR, PON TU SANGRE

aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.translation: on my ear so I will hear you

translations.es: SEÑOR, PON TU SANGRE

translations.es: SELLADO CON TU SANGRE Y GRABADO EN MI CORAZÓN

translations.es: POR UN NUEVO PACTO SANGRE FUE DERRAMADA

translations.en: was spilled for me, Lord
translations.es: POR MÍ, SEÑOR

aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.transliteration: adon sim et damkha al bohen ragli
aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.translation: Lord put your blood on my toe

translations.cs: PANE, POLOŽ SVOU KREV NA PALEC MÉ NOHY
translations.ru: ГОСПОДЬ, ВОЗЛОЖИ КРОВЬ СВОЮ НА ПАЛЬЦЫ НОГ МОИХ
translations.es: SEÑOR, PON TU SANGRE EN EL DEDO DE MI PIE

aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.translation: so I will walk in your ways

aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.originalText: אדון שים את דמך על מזבח ליבי
aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.transliteration: adon sim et damkha al mizbeakh libi
aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.translation: Lord put your blood on the alter of my heart

aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.originalText: קח את ליבי את כל כולי

aac5e2b9-0370-4912-b1b0-b6bf97fec074.translation: Take my heart, all of me

translations.ru: КАК ЦВЕТЫ — ВСЕ СЕРДЦА НАШИ ПРЕД ТОБОЮ РАСКРЫВАЮТСЯ

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.originalText: עַנְנֵי הַחֵטְא הָמֵס נָא, אֲפֵלַת-סָפֵק מִתְּהוֹם
6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.transliteration: anane hakhet hames na afelat safem mthom
6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Melt the clouds of sin and sadness; Drive the dark of doubt away;

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.transliteration: hatsifenu osher netsakh umalenu zohar yom
6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Giver of immortal gladness, Fill us with the light of day!

translations.en: Giver of immortal gladness, Fill us with the light of day!
translations.cs: NAPLŇ NÁS VĚČNÝM ŠTĚSTÍM A JASEM DNE

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.originalText: אֶרֶץ, יָם, וּתְכוֹל רָקִיעַ, כּוֹכָבִים וּמַלְאָכִים

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Stars and angels sing around Thee, Center of unbroken praise.

translations.ru: ЗЕМЛЯ, МОРЕ И СВОД НЕБЕСНЫЙ, ЗВЁЗДЫ И АНГЕЛЫ

translations.ru: НИВА И ЛЕС, ДОЛИНА И ХОЛМ
translations.es: CAMPO Y BOSQUE, VALLE Y MONTE

translations.es: ARENA DEL DESIERTO Y AGUAS DEL MAR

translations.en: Singing bird and flowing fountain

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Call us to rejoice in Thee

translations.es: ALABAN TU NOMBRE EXALTADO

translations.en: Mortals, join the happy chorus,
translations.es: MORTALES, ALCEN SUS VOCES JUNTOS

translations.es: CON LOS EJÉRCITOS DE ÁNGELES

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Father love is reigning o’er us, Brother love binds man to man.

translations.ru: ЛЮБОВЬ БОЖЬЯ ЦАРСТВУЕТ И БУДЕТ ЦАРСТВОВАТЬ ВОВЕКИ

translations.es: CANTANDO MARCHAMOS ADELANTE

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Victors in the midst of strife,

6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.transliteration: manginot halel tn'emna et darkenu el dvirkha
6127ba2e-3644-40b9-aa39-56ca3ce38bf1.translation: Joyful music leads us Sunward In the triumph song of life.

0805d21c-970c-4d09-89a2-440ebe867723.transliteration: adon kol habria nashir lekha nashir lekha

translations.en: Son of David, mighty God, Holy Holy Holy

translations.es: TODA LA TIERRA ESTÁ LLENA DE TU GLORIA

translations.cs: A KDO JSEM JÁ, HŘÍŠNÝ A NEČISTÝ ČLOVĚK
translations.ru: И КТО Я, ЧЕЛОВЕК ГРЕШНЫЙ И НЕЧИСТЫЙ
translations.es: ¿Y QUIÉN SOY YO, UN HOMBRE PECADOR E IMPURO?

1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.translation: That the King Lord of hosts

translations.en: I will see with my eyes

1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.translation: You are the the way, You are my savior
1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.originalText: אתה הוא הדרך, אתה הוא מושיעי
1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.transliteration: ata hu haderekh, ata hu moshi'ee

1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.translation: You've redeemed over my sins

translations.es: EXPIASTE MIS PECADOS

1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.translation: You've brought me into the Father's presence

translations.en: You've brought me into the Father's presence

translations.es: ME LLEVASTE A LA PRESENCIA DEL PADRE

1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.translation: Now I hear Your voice

translations.en: Now I hear Your voice

1b953c38-950f-4024-9dae-33c767ff41fe.translation: Follow me, I am with You

translations.en: Follow me, I am with You

translations.es: SÍGUEME, YO ESTOY CONTIGO

ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.translation: The first and the last, Alpha and Omega

translations.en: The first and the last, Alpha and Omega
translations.cs: PRVNÍ A POSLEDNÍ, ALFA A OMEGA
translations.ru: ПЕРВЫЙ И ПОСЛЕДНИЙ, АЛЬФА И ОМЕГА
translations.es: EL PRIMERO Y EL ÚLTIMO, EL ALFA Y LA OMEGA

ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.translation: King of glory, King of kings

translations.en: King of glory, King of kings
translations.es: REY DE GLORIA, REY DE REYES

ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.translation: Yeshua is the Lord, the lamb of God

translations.en: Yeshua is the Lord, the lamb of God
translations.es: JESÚS ES EL SEÑOR, EL CORDERO DE DIOS

ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.translation: Worthy of honor, King of kings

translations.en: Worthy of honor, King of kings

ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.translation: Mighty and sovreign, You alone are the Lord
ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.originalText: אל גיבור ואל עליון, לבדך אתה אדון
ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.transliteration: el gibor ve'El elyon, levadkha ata adon

translations.ru: БОГ МОГУЧИЙ И ВСЕВЫШНИЙ, ТЫ ОДИН ГОСПОДЬ
translations.es: DIOS PODEROSO Y SOBERANO, SOLO TÚ ERES EL SEÑOR

ace6e181-2f5f-422c-87a2-b959749856f3.translation: You alone are holy, King of kings

f2a46b88-7cbb-4c0c-973d-12f6db3055aa.originalText: יום ליום ליום יביע, ולילה ללילה
f2a46b88-7cbb-4c0c-973d-12f6db3055aa.transliteration: yom le'yom le'yom yabia ve'layla le'layla

translations.ru: ДЕНЬ ЗА ДНЁМ ИЗЛИВАЮТ РЕЧЬ, И НОЧЬ ЗА НОЧЬЮ

f2a46b88-7cbb-4c0c-973d-12f6db3055aa.translation: of my heart be pleasing in your sight

f2a46b88-7cbb-4c0c-973d-12f6db3055aa.translation: The Lord my rock and my salvation

translations.en: The Lord my rock and my salvation

translations.ru: ГОСПОДЬ МОЯ СКАЛА И МОЙ ИСКУПИТЕЛЬ
translations.es: SEÑOR, ROCA MÍA Y REDENTOR MÍO

f2a46b88-7cbb-4c0c-973d-12f6db3055aa.translation: and He is like a bridegroom coming out of his chamber

translations.en: Yes my heart is yours
translations.ru: ДА СЕРДЦЕ МОЁ, СЕРДЦЕ МОЁ ТВОЁ

f2a46b88-7cbb-4c0c-973d-12f6db3055aa.translation: We are calling to you Yeshua

translations.en: We are calling to you Yeshua

00fcab0e-4021-4461-86bd-de7f08b118ae.translation: I want to be more like you

translations.es: QUIERO SER MÁS COMO TÚ

translations.en: I want to be a vessel in your hands

translations.en: Use me
translations.es: ÚSAME, ÚSAME

translations.en: Use me Lord
translations.es: ÚSAME SEÑOR

03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.translation: as long as our heart is beating

03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.transliteration: ro-eim she lo shahahta et amcha

03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.translation: to see your nation

03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.originalText: כי רצונך הוא להושיע את עמך
03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.transliteration: ki retzoncha hu lehoshia et amcha

translations.cs: PROTOZE TVOU TOUHOU JE ZACHRANIT SVUJ LID

03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.translation: and to show your mercy

03e46e8d-746f-457e-a1fd-f775ecfcced6.translation: and to have the last say

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: We have heard your report about you

translations.es: HEMOS OÍDO TU FAMA

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: We have seen your works

translations.en: We have seen your works

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.originalText: ליבנו ביראה מול אלוהים כל כך נפלא
74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.transliteration: libenu be yirah mul Elohim kol kakh nifla

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: We have prayed all the prayers

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.originalText: ובכל זאת נותרנו, עם רעב לעוד
74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.transliteration: u'bekhol zot notarnu im ra'av le'od

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: To see You steel the stage

translations.cs: VIDĚT TĚ, JAK SI BEREŠ PÓDIUM
translations.ru: УВИДЕТЬ КАК ТЫ ВЫХОДИШЬ НА СЦЕНУ
translations.es: DE VERTE CONQUISTAR EL ESCENARIO

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: To see You move in the church

translations.en: To see You move in the church
translations.ru: УВИДЕТЬ КАК ТЫ ДЕЙСТВУЕШЬ В ЦЕРКВИ
translations.es: DE VERTE OBRAR EN LA IGLESIA

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: We have been waiting for You for years

translations.en: We have been waiting for You for years

translations.es: AÑOS HEMOS ESTADO ESPERÁNDOTE

translations.cs: SLÍBIL JSI, ŽE VYLIJEŠ SVÉHO DUCHA
translations.ru: ТЫ ОБЕЩАЛ ЧТО ИЗОЛЬЁШЬ СВОЙ ДУХ
translations.es: PROMETISTE QUE DERRAMARÍAS TU ESPÍRITU

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.originalText: זה מתחיל כאן, זה מתחיל עכשיו

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: It all starts here

translations.en: It all starts here
translations.es: COMIENZA AQUÍ

translations.en: When we are together on our knees
translations.es: CUANDO ESTAMOS DE RODILLAS JUNTOS

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.originalText: עושים לך מקום, ומפנים את הזמן
74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.transliteration: osim lekha makom u'mefanim et ha'zman

74fb39bc-25aa-400a-a160-834516549ffb.translation: This is Your desire

aba5671d-9aba-42e8-8b34-1129801f8aa3.translation: and call on the name of the Lord.

d27140c1-d854-4bc6-84d2-37a8fd84cf04.translation: that I will see, it will not separate me from you
d27140c1-d854-4bc6-84d2-37a8fd84cf04.originalText: אני אראה, לא יפרידו אותי ממך
d27140c1-d854-4bc6-84d2-37a8fd84cf04.transliteration: ani ereh, lo yafridu oti mimkha

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: To God be the glory, for great things He has done

translations.cs: BOHU BUDIŽ SLÁVA ZA VŠECHNY JEHO SKUTKY,
translations.ru: БОГУ СЛАВА ЗА ВСЕ ЕГО ДЕЛА

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.originalText: כּי את עוֹלמנוּ הוּא כּל-כּך אָהב,
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.transliteration: ki et olamenu hu kolkakh ahav

translations.en: So loved He the world
translations.ru: ИБО МИР НАШ ОН ТАК ВОЗЛЮБИЛ
translations.es: PORQUE TANTO AMÓ A NUESTRO MUNDO

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: that He gave us His Son, who yielded His life our redemption to win
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.originalText: עד כּי בּנוֹ שׁלח לכפּר חטאים,
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.transliteration: ad ki bno shalakh lekhaper khataim

translations.en: that He gave us His Son, who yielded His life our redemption to win

translations.es: QUE ENVIÓ A SU HIJO PARA EXPIAR LOS PECADOS

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: And opened the life-gate that all may go in

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, Let the earth hear His voice;

translations.en: Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, Let the earth hear His voice;
translations.cs: "PÍSEŇ CHVAL! PÍSEŇ BOHU!" AŤ ZPÍVÁ CELÝ SVĚT!
translations.ru: ПОЙТЕ! ПОЙТЕ БОГУ! ПУСТЬ ВЕСЬ МИР ПОЁТ!
translations.es: ¡CANTO DE ALABANZA! ¡CANTO A DIOS! ¡QUE CANTE EL MUNDO!

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, let the people rejoice;
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.originalText: "שׁיר הלּל! שׁיר לאל!" יענוּ בּני אָדם.

translations.en: Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, let the people rejoice;
translations.cs: "PÍSEŇ CHVAL! PÍSEŇ BOHU!" AŤ ODPOVÍDAJÍ LIDÉ.
translations.ru: ПОЙТЕ! ПОЙТЕ БОГУ! ПУСТЬ ЛЮДИ ЛИКУЮТ!
translations.es: ¡CANTO DE ALABANZA! ¡CANTO A DIOS! ¡QUE RESPONDAN LOS PUEBLOS!

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: Oh, come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,

translations.en: Oh, come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
translations.cs: VOLEJTE K JEŽÍŠI A POJĎTE K OTCI,
translations.ru: ПРИЗОВИТЕ ИЕШУА И ПРИДИТЕ К ОТЦУ
translations.es: CLAMEN A YESHÚA Y VENGAN AL PADRE

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: And give Him the glory; great things He hath done.
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.originalText: ורוֹנּוּ לוֹ זמר על כּל מעשׂיו.
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.transliteration: veronu lo zemer al kol maasav

translations.en: And give Him the glory; great things He hath done.
translations.cs: A ZPÍVEJTE MU CHVÁLU ZA VŠECHNY JEHO SKUTKY.
translations.ru: И ВОСПОЙТЕ ЕМУ ЗА ВСЕ ЕГО ДЕЛА
translations.es: Y CÁNTENLE CON GOZO POR TODAS SUS OBRAS

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: Oh, perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,

translations.en: Oh, perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
translations.es: PERFECTA ES LA REDENCIÓN, COMPRADA CON SANGRE

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: To every believer the promise of God;

translations.en: To every believer the promise of God;
translations.es: PARA TODO CREYENTE, LA PROMESA DE DIOS

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: The vilest offender who truly believes
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.originalText: אַף גּדוֹל הפּוֹשׁעים, אם ישׁוּב מפּשעיו
75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.transliteration: af gdol haposhim im yashuv mipshaav

translations.en: The vilest offender who truly believes
translations.cs: I TEN NEJVĚTŠÍ HŘÍŠNÍK, KDYŽ SE ODVRÁTÍ OD SVÝCH HŘÍCHŮ,
translations.es: AUN EL MAYOR DE LOS PECADORES, SI SE ARREPIENTE

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

translations.en: That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.
translations.cs: V TOM OKAMŽIKU BUDOU JEHO HŘÍCHY ODPUŠTĚNY!
translations.ru: В ТОТ ЖЕ МИГ ПРОЩЕНЫ БУДУТ ГРЕХИ ЕГО
translations.es: EN ESE INSTANTE SUS PECADOS SERÁN PERDONADOS

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done,

translations.en: Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done,
translations.cs: VELIKÉ JE JEHO UČENÍ, MOCNÉ JSOU JEHO SKUTKY,
translations.ru: ВЕЛИКО УЧЕНИЕ ЕГО, МОГУЩЕСТВЕННЫ ДЕЛА ЕГО
translations.es: GRANDE ES SU ENSEÑANZA, PODEROSAS SUS OBRAS

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;

translations.en: And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;
translations.cs: VELIKÁ JE NAŠE RADOST V SYNU I V OTCI.
translations.ru: ВЕЛИКА РАДОСТЬ НАША В СЫНЕ И В ОТЦЕ
translations.es: GRANDE ES NUESTRO GOZO EN EL HIJO Y EN EL PADRE

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: But purer, and higher, and greater will be

translations.en: But purer, and higher, and greater will be

translations.es: PERO SIETE VECES MÁS CRECERÁ NUESTRA DICHA

75538e2f-6f26-4d7a-8670-e2976760b690.translation: Our wonder, our transport when Jesus we see.

translations.en: Our wonder, our transport when Jesus we see.

translations.ru: КОГДА ЛИЦО СПАСИТЕЛЯ НАШЕГО, ИЕШУА, УВИДИМ

d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.originalText: לא לנו כי לך המלחמה X4
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.transliteration: lo lanu ki leha hamilhama X4

translations.ru: НЕ НАМ, НО ТЕБЕ ПРИНАДЛЕЖИТ БИТВА

translations.en: Give thanks to the Lord
translations.cs: VZDÁVEJTE DÍKY, VZDÁVEJTE DÍKY, VZDÁVEJTE DÍKY PÁNU X3
translations.es: DAD GRACIAS, DAD GRACIAS, DAD GRACIAS AL SEÑOR X3

translations.en: for his mercy endures forever

d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.translation: Not ours, but yours is the victory
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.originalText: לא לנו כי לך הניצחון X4
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.transliteration: lo lanu ki leha hanitsahon X4

translations.en: Not ours, but yours is the victory
translations.cs: NE NÁM, ALE TOBĚ PATŘÍ VÍTĚZSTVÍ X4
translations.ru: НЕ НАМ, НО ТЕБЕ ПРИНАДЛЕЖИТ ПОБЕДА
translations.es: NO ES NUESTRA, SINO TUYA ES LA VICTORIA X4

d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.translation: Not ours, but yours is the salvation
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.originalText: לא לנו כי לך הישועה x4
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.transliteration: lo lanu ki leha haieshu'a X4

translations.en: Not ours, but yours is the salvation
translations.cs: NE NÁM, ALE TOBĚ PATŘÍ SPASENÍ X4
translations.ru: НЕ НАМ, НО ТЕБЕ ПРИНАДЛЕЖИТ СПАСЕНИЕ
translations.es: NO ES NUESTRA, SINO TUYA ES LA SALVACIÓN X4

d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.translation: Not ours but to you all the honour
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.originalText: לא לנו כי לך כל הכבוד x4
d1cb8b55-e74f-4e8f-983b-b91c569105d1.transliteration: lo lanu ki leha kol hakavod X4

translations.en: Not ours but to you all the honour
translations.cs: NE NÁM, ALE TOBĚ PATŘÍ VŠECHNA SLÁVA X4
translations.ru: НЕ НАМ, НО ТЕБЕ ВСЯ СЛАВА
translations.es: NO ES NUESTRA, SINO TUYA ES TODA LA GLORIA X4

819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.translation: Where can I go from your spirit?

translations.en: Where can I go from your spirit?
translations.es: ¿A DÓNDE IRÉ LEJOS DE TU ESPÍRITU?

819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.translation: where can I flee from your presence?

translations.en: where can I flee from your presence?
translations.ru: И ОТ ЛИЦА ТВОЕГО КУДА УБЕГУ?
translations.es: ¿A DÓNDE HUIRÉ DE TU PRESENCIA?

819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.translation: How can I hide myself from you?

translations.en: How can I hide myself from you?

translations.ru: КАК Я МОГУ СОКРЫТЬСЯ ОТ ТЕБЯ?

819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.translation: If I rise on the wings of the dawn
819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.originalText: גם אם אשא על כנפי שחר
819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.transliteration: gam im esa al kanfe shakhar

translations.cs: I KDYBYCH SE VZNESL NA KŘÍDLECH ÚSVITU

819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.translation: if I settle on the far side of the sea

819e267f-1821-449d-b8e2-a8c0f56d9f74.translation: your right hand will hold me fast

translations.en: Every breath I breath

91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.translation: To Him be the glory and in the messiah Yeshua

translations.en: To Him be the glory and in the messiah Yeshua
translations.cs: JEMU BUDIŽ SLÁVA V MESIÁŠI JEŽÍŠI

91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.translation: To Him be the glory in the midst of the congregation

translations.en: To Him be the glory in the midst of the congregation

translations.en: forever and ever. amen.

translations.en: Yeshua we worship you

91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.translation: with one heart and one voice we'll proclaim your greatness
91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.originalText: בלב אחד בקול אחד נכריז את גדולתך
91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.transliteration: belev ekhad bekol ekhad nakhriz gdulatkha

translations.ru: ОДНИМ СЕРДЦЕМ И ОДНИМ ГОЛОСОМ ВОЗВЕЩАЕМ ВЕЛИЧИЕ ТВОЁ

91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.translation: Father of mercy Lord of grace

translations.es: PADRE DE MISERICORDIA DIOS DE GRACIA

91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.translation: pour your spirit on us, let your kingdom come
91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.originalText: שפוך את רוח קודשך תבוא מלכותך
91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.transliteration: shfokh et ruakh kodshekha tavo malkhutkha

translations.ru: ИЗЛЕЙ СВЯТОЙ ДУХ ТВОЙ, ДА ПРИДЁТ ЦАРСТВО ТВОЁ

91c5afec-3a55-4499-bc34-dd55107722d5.translation: Honor, Glory and power to You

translations.es: HONOR, GLORIA Y PODER A TI

translations.en: My heart is yours Yeshua, and my life is in your hand
translations.cs: MÉ SRDCE JE TVÉ, JEŽÍŠI, A MŮJ ŽIVOT JE V TVÝCH RUKOU
translations.ru: СЕРДЦЕ МОЁ ТВОЁ, ИЕШУА, И ЖИЗНЬ МОЯ В РУКЕ ТВОЕЙ

111e9053-9934-4d0f-9282-414a53a509d0.translation: in your name Lord and I stust, in your word i will abide

translations.en: in your name Lord and I stust, in your word i will abide
translations.cs: VE TVÉM JMÉNU, PANE, DŮVĚŘUJI, VE TVÉM SLOVĚ BUDU PŘEBÝVAT
translations.ru: НА ИМЯ ТВОЁ, ГОСПОДЬ, УПОВАЮ, В СЛОВЕ ТВОЁМ ПРЕБУДУ
translations.es: EN TU NOMBRE SEÑOR CONFIARÉ, EN TU PALABRA PERMANECERÉ

111e9053-9934-4d0f-9282-414a53a509d0.originalText: כי אין כמוך אלוהים גדול ונפלא
111e9053-9934-4d0f-9282-414a53a509d0.transliteration: ki en kamokha elohim gadol venifla

translations.en: There is none like You, great and wonderful
translations.cs: NEBOŤ NIKDO NENÍ JAKO TY, VELIKÝ A PODIVUHODNÝ BOŽE
translations.ru: ИБО НЕТ ПОДОБНОГО ТЕБЕ, БОЖЕ ВЕЛИКИЙ И ДИВНЫЙ
translations.es: NO HAY NADIE COMO TÚ DIOS GRANDE Y MARAVILLOSO

111e9053-9934-4d0f-9282-414a53a509d0.translation: Full of compasion and love, my heart will sing for you
111e9053-9934-4d0f-9282-414a53a509d0.originalText: מלא אהבה ורחמים ליבי ישיר לך
111e9053-9934-4d0f-9282-414a53a509d0.transliteration: male ahava verakhamim libi yashir lekha

translations.en: Full of compasion and love, my heart will sing for you

translations.ru: ПОЛНЫЙ ЛЮБВИ И МИЛОСТИ, СЕРДЦЕ МОЁ ПОЁТ ТЕБЕ

translations.es: VENGAN Y VOLVAMOS AL SEÑOR

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: for He has torn us, that He may heal us;

translations.en: for He has torn us, that He may heal us;
translations.cs: NEBOŤ ON NÁS RANIL A ON NÁS UZDRAVÍ;
translations.ru: ИБО ОН УЯЗВИЛ И ОН ИСЦЕЛИТ НАС
translations.es: PORQUE ÉL NOS HA HERIDO Y ÉL NOS SANARÁ

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: He has struck us down, and he will bind us up

translations.cs: UDEŘIL NÁS A OBVÁŽE NAŠE RÁNY
translations.es: ÉL NOS HA GOLPEADO Y ÉL NOS VENDARÁ

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: After two days he will revive us;

translations.en: After two days he will revive us;
translations.es: NOS DARÁ VIDA DESPUÉS DE DOS DÍAS

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: on the third day he will raise us up,

translations.en: on the third day he will raise us up,
translations.cs: TŘETÍHO DNE NÁS POSTAVÍ NA NOHY
translations.es: AL TERCER DÍA NOS LEVANTARÁ

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: After two days he will revive us;

translations.en: After two days he will revive us;
translations.es: NOS DARÁ VIDA DESPUÉS DE DOS DÍAS

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: that we may live before him.

translations.en: that we may live before him.
translations.cs: A BUDEME ŽÍT PŘED JEHO TVÁŘÍ.
translations.ru: И МЫ БУДЕМ ЖИТЬ ПРЕД ЛИЦОМ ЕГО
translations.es: Y VIVIREMOS DELANTE DE ÉL

7c9976ec-83b1-401e-94dd-bb552b96c0dd.translation: Let us know; let us press on

translations.en: to know the Lord
translations.es: POR CONOCER AL SEÑOR

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.translation: Let us shout to the rock of our salvation

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.originalText: נקדמה פניו בתודה בזמירות נריע לו
38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.transliteration: nekadma panav betoda bzmirot naria lo

translations.cs: PŘEDSTUPME PŘED NĚHO S DÍKŮVZDÁNÍM, S PÍSNĚMI MU JÁSEJME
translations.ru: ПРЕДСТАНЕМ ПРЕД ЛИЦОМ ЕГО С БЛАГОДАРЕНИЕМ, В ПЕСНЯХ ВОСКЛИКНЕМ ЕМУ

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.translation: for the Lord is the great God

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.originalText: בידו מחקרי ארץ ותועפות הרים לו
38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.transliteration: beyado mekhkere arets vetoafot harim lo

translations.ru: В ЕГО РУКЕ ГЛУБИНЫ ЗЕМЛИ И ВЕРШИНЫ ГОР — ЕГО
translations.es: EN SU MANO ESTÁN LAS PROFUNDIDADES DE LA TIERRA Y LAS ALTURAS DE LOS MONTES SON SUYOS

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.translation: The sea is His for He made it

translations.cs: JEHO JE MOŘE, ON JE UČINIL
translations.ru: ЕГО МОРЕ, ИБО ОН СОТВОРИЛ ЕГО
translations.es: SUYO ES EL MAR PORQUE ÉL LO HIZO

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.translation: and His hands formed the dry land

38afa3db-0196-4d7a-a338-1f020ccdfe2e.translation: Come let us worship and bow down

translations.ru: ПОКЛОНИМСЯ И ПРИПАДЁМ, ПРЕКЛОНИМ КОЛЕНИ ПРЕД СОЗДАТЕЛЕМ НАШИМ
translations.es: ADOREMOS Y POSTRÉMONOS ARRODILLÉMONOS ANTE ÉL

translations.ru: СОЛНЦЕ, ЛЕТО И ЗИМУ ТЫ СОТВОРИЛ

9aff3e71-cfe0-4813-b1c4-e4c95338a645.translation: But for me it is good to be near God

translations.en: But for me it is good to be near God

translations.ru: А МНЕ БЛАГО ПРИБЛИЖАТЬСЯ К БОГУ

9aff3e71-cfe0-4813-b1c4-e4c95338a645.translation: I have made the Lord God my refuge

translations.ru: Я СДЕЛАЛ ГОСПОДА БОГА ПРИБЕЖИЩЕМ МОИМ
translations.es: EN EL SEÑOR MI DIOS HE PUESTO MI REFUGIO

9aff3e71-cfe0-4813-b1c4-e4c95338a645.translation: that I may tell of all your works

translations.es: PARA CONTAR, CONTAR TODAS TUS OBRAS

translations.en: But I will hope continually
translations.es: PERO YO SIEMPRE ESPERARÉ

9aff3e71-cfe0-4813-b1c4-e4c95338a645.translation: and will praise you yet more and more

translations.es: Y AÑADIRÉ MÁS Y MÁS A TU ALABANZA

9aff3e71-cfe0-4813-b1c4-e4c95338a645.translation: that I may tell of all Your greatness

translations.en: that I may tell of all Your greatness

translations.es: PARA CONTAR, CONTAR TODA TU GRANDEZA

ff96d06f-5216-4563-8377-c191d3829572.translation: All who are thirsty All who are weak

translations.ru: ВСЕ, КТО ЖАЖДЕТ, И КТО ОСЛАБЕЛ

ff96d06f-5216-4563-8377-c191d3829572.transliteration: ha'ke'ev ve'hatsa'ar itpogegu be'maga im libo

ff96d06f-5216-4563-8377-c191d3829572.translation: As the deep cries out to deep, we sing

translations.ru: ПРЕД ТОБОЮ Я СКЛОНЯЮСЬ НА КОЛЕНИ

07b8d6d3-83d4-4519-a469-20c9046607f1.translation: Giving you all authority over all of my days

translations.en: because your my God
translations.es: PORQUE TÚ ERES MI DIOS

translations.en: You alone are Yeshua

6ea88a66-c8a5-4f02-954e-c4364ab35f8e.originalText: אדוני מעון אתה לנו בדור ודור

6ea88a66-c8a5-4f02-954e-c4364ab35f8e.translation: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever you had formed the earth and the world

6ea88a66-c8a5-4f02-954e-c4364ab35f8e.transliteration: bterem harim iuladu vatholel erts vetevel

translations.ru: НИЧТО НЕ НЕВОЗМОЖНО ДЛЯ ТЕБЯ x2

translations.cs: NEBOŤ JSI VYSVOBODIL MOU DUŠI ZE SMRTI, MÉ OČI OD SLZÍ

5bb2af58-7be9-4cb4-b3a8-2b9f8ce9d98e.translation: that I may walk in the land of the living

translations.cs: NEBOŤ JSI VYSVOBODIL MOU DUŠI ZE SMRTI, MÉ OČI OD SLZÍ
translations.ru: ИБО ТЫ ИЗБАВИЛ ДУШУ МОЮ ОТ СМЕРТИ, ОЧИ МОИ ОТ СЛЁЗ

5bb2af58-7be9-4cb4-b3a8-2b9f8ce9d98e.translation: that I may walk in the land of the living

translations.cs: JAK VELIKÉ JSOU TVÉ SKUTKY, MŮJ PANE

translations.cs: KDO MŮŽE OBSTÁT PŘED TEBOU, Ó BOŽE
translations.es: ¿QUIÉN PODRÁ ESTAR EN TU PRESENCIA, OH DIOS?

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: I am unclean, you are holy

translations.en: I am unclean, you are holy
translations.cs: JÁ JSEM NEČISTÝ, TY JSI SVATÝ
translations.es: YO SOY IMPURO, TÚ ERES SANTO

translations.en: but with you is forgiveness
translations.es: PERO CONTIGO ESTÁ EL PERDÓN

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: you have clothed me with garments of salvation

translations.en: you have clothed me with garments of salvation
translations.ru: В ОДЕЖДЫ СПАСЕНИЯ ТЫ ОБЛЁК МЕНЯ
translations.es: ME HAS VESTIDO CON ROPAS DE SALVACIÓN

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: I wait for the LORD, my soul waits

translations.en: I wait for the LORD, my soul waits
translations.cs: ČEKÁM NA HOSPODINA, MÁ DUŠE ČEKÁ
translations.ru: Я УПОВАЮ НА ГОСПОДА, ДУША МОЯ УПОВАЕТ
translations.es: ESPERÉ EN EL SEÑOR, MI ALMA ESPERA

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: in his word i hope my soul waits for the lord

translations.en: in his word i hope my soul waits for the lord
translations.cs: V JEHO SLOVO DOUFÁM, MÁ DUŠE ČEKÁ NA PÁNA
translations.ru: НА СЛОВО ЕГО Я НАДЕЮСЬ, ДУША МОЯ ЖДЁТ ГОСПОДА
translations.es: EN SU PALABRA ESPERO, MI ALMA ESPERA EN EL SEÑOR

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: O Israel, hope in the LORD

translations.en: O Israel, hope in the LORD
translations.es: ESPERA, OH ISRAEL, EN EL SEÑOR

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: For with the you there is mercy

translations.en: For with the you there is mercy
translations.es: PORQUE CONTIGO ESTÁ LA MISERICORDIA

a0fa0517-673c-4d46-a9e7-595665482491.translation: and with you oh LORD there is abundant redemption

translations.en: and with you oh LORD there is abundant redemption
translations.cs: A U TEBE JE VYKOUPENÍ, Ó PANE
translations.es: Y CONTIGO, OH SEÑOR, ESTÁ LA ABUNDANTE REDENCIÓN

translations.en: Who is like you Lord
translations.es: ¿QUIÉN COMO TÚ, SEÑOR?

36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.translation: You are great and your name is great in might

translations.en: You are great and your name is great in might
translations.cs: JSI VELIKÝ A TVÉ JMÉNO JE VELIKÉ V MOCI
translations.ru: ВЕЛИК ТЫ И ВЕЛИКО ИМЯ ТВОЁ В МОГУЩЕСТВЕ
translations.es: GRANDE ERES TÚ Y GRANDE ES TU NOMBRE EN PODER

36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.translation: There is none like you Lord

translations.en: There is none like you Lord
translations.es: NO HAY NADIE COMO TÚ, SEÑOR

36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.translation: You are great and your name is great in might

translations.en: You are great and your name is great in might
translations.cs: JSI VELIKÝ A TVÉ JMÉNO JE VELIKÉ V MOCI
translations.ru: ВЕЛИК ТЫ И ВЕЛИКО ИМЯ ТВОЁ В МОГУЩЕСТВЕ
translations.es: GRANDE ERES TÚ Y GRANDE ES TU NOMBRE EN PODER

36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.translation: The Lord is the true God

translations.en: The Lord is the true God
translations.es: EL SEÑOR DIOS ES EL DIOS VERDADERO

36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.translation: The living God, king of the universe

translations.en: The living God, king of the universe
translations.es: EL DIOS VIVIENTE Y REY DEL UNIVERSO

36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.translation: He is the creator of Everything The Lord of hosts is His name
36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.originalText: כי יוצר הכל הוא אדוני צבאות שמו
36e7c5db-3051-4f07-a95a-f52f0f6c56bb.transliteration: ki yotser hakol hu adonai tsva'ot shemo

translations.en: He is the creator of Everything The Lord of hosts is His name
translations.cs: ON JE STVOŘITEL VŠEHO, HOSPODIN ZÁSTUPŮ JE JEHO JMÉNO
translations.ru: ОН ТВОРЕЦ ВСЕГО, ГОСПОДЬ САВАОФ — ИМЯ ЕГО
translations.es: ÉL ES EL CREADOR DE TODO, SEÑOR DE LOS EJÉRCITOS ES SU NOMBRE

508c7546-195e-4d1f-8841-2d0ff367a5cc.translation: Who is like you among the gods, Oh Lord

translations.en: Who is like you among the gods, Oh Lord
translations.cs: KDO JE JAKO TY MEZI BOHY, Ó HOSPODINE
translations.ru: КТО КАК ТЫ СРЕДИ БОГОВ, ГОСПОДИ
translations.es: ¿QUIÉN COMO TÚ ENTRE LOS DIOSES, OH SEÑOR?

508c7546-195e-4d1f-8841-2d0ff367a5cc.translation: Who is like you, glorious in holiness

translations.en: Who is like you, glorious in holiness
translations.cs: KDO JE JAKO TY, SLAVNÝ VE SVATOSTI
translations.ru: КТО КАК ТЫ, ВЕЛИЧЕСТВЕННЫЙ В СВЯТОСТИ
translations.es: ¿QUIÉN COMO TÚ, GLORIOSO EN SANTIDAD?

508c7546-195e-4d1f-8841-2d0ff367a5cc.originalText: נורא תהילות עושה פלא עושה פלא
508c7546-195e-4d1f-8841-2d0ff367a5cc.transliteration: nora tehilot ose fele ose fele

translations.en: Fearful in praises, doing wonders
translations.ru: ДИВНЫЙ В ХВАЛАХ, ТВОРЯЩИЙ ЧУДЕСА, ТВОРЯЩИЙ ЧУДЕСА
translations.es: TEMIBLE EN ALABANZAS, HACIENDO MARAVILLAS, HACIENDO MARAVILLAS

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: Who will not fear you, Lord,

translations.en: Who will not fear you, Lord,
translations.cs: KDO SE TĚ NEBUDE BÁT, PANE
translations.es: ¿QUIÉN NO TE TEMERÁ, SEÑOR,

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: and bring glory to your name?

translations.en: and bring glory to your name?
translations.es: Y NO DARÁ GLORIA A TU NOMBRE?

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: Great and marvelous are your deeds, Lord God Almighty.

translations.en: Great and marvelous are your deeds, Lord God Almighty.
translations.cs: VELIKÉ A PODIVUHODNÉ JSOU TVÉ SKUTKY, PANE
translations.ru: ВЕЛИКИ И ДИВНЫ ДЕЛА ТВОИ, ГОСПОДИ
translations.es: GRANDES Y MARAVILLOSAS SON TUS OBRAS, SEÑOR DIOS TODOPODEROSO

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: All nations will come and worship before you

translations.en: All nations will come and worship before you
translations.cs: VŠECHNY NÁRODY PŘIJDOU A BUDOU SE KLANĚT PŘED TEBOU
translations.ru: ВСЕ НАРОДЫ ПРИДУТ И ПОКЛОНЯТСЯ ПРЕД ТОБОЙ
translations.es: TODAS LAS NACIONES VENDRÁN Y ADORARÁN ANTE TI

translations.en: For you alone are holy.
translations.es: PORQUE SOLO TÚ ERES SANTO

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: to him who sits upon the throne and to the Lamb

translations.en: to him who sits upon the throne and to the Lamb
translations.cs: TOMU, KDO SEDÍ NA TRŮNU, A BERÁNKOVI
translations.es: AL QUE ESTÁ SENTADO EN EL TRONO Y AL CORDERO

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: praise and honor and glory and power, forevermore
e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.originalText: ברכה כבוד ועוז, לעולם ועד ואמרו אמן
e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.transliteration: Brakha kavod va'oz le'olam va’ed veimru amen

translations.en: praise and honor and glory and power, forevermore
translations.cs: CHVÁLA, ČEST, SLÁVA A MOC NA VĚKY VĚKŮ, AMEN
translations.ru: БЛАГОСЛОВЕНИЕ, ЧЕСТЬ И СИЛА ВО ВЕКИ ВЕКОВ, АМИНЬ
translations.es: ALABANZA, HONOR, GLORIA Y PODER, POR LOS SIGLOS DE LOS SIGLOS

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: praise and honor and glory and power, forevermore
e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.originalText: ברכה כבוד ועוז, לעולם ועד ואמרו אמן
e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.transliteration: Brakha kavod va'oz le'olam va’ed veimru amen

translations.en: praise and honor and glory and power, forevermore
translations.cs: CHVÁLA, ČEST, SLÁVA A MOC NA VĚKY VĚKŮ, AMEN
translations.ru: БЛАГОСЛОВЕНИЕ, ЧЕСТЬ И СИЛА ВО ВЕКИ ВЕКОВ, АМИНЬ
translations.es: ALABANZA, HONOR, GLORIA Y PODER, POR LOS SIGLOS DE LOS SIGLOS

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: to him who sits upon the throne and to the Lamb

translations.en: to him who sits upon the throne and to the Lamb
translations.cs: TOMU, KDO SEDÍ NA TRŮNU, A BERÁNKOVI
translations.es: AL QUE ESTÁ SENTADO EN EL TRONO Y AL CORDERO

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: Worthy is the lamb that was crucified

translations.en: Worthy is the lamb that was crucified
translations.cs: HODEN JE BERÁNEK, KTERÝ BYL OBĚTOVÁN
translations.es: DIGNO ES EL CORDERO QUE FUE SACRIFICADO

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: To recieve power, wisdom glory and blessing
e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.originalText: לקבל גבורה חכמה כוח כבוד וברכה
e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.transliteration: Lekabel gvura khokhma koakh kavod ubrakha

translations.en: To recieve power, wisdom glory and blessing
translations.cs: PŘIJMOUT MOC, MOUDROST, SLÁVU A POŽEHNÁNÍ
translations.ru: ПРИНЯТЬ СИЛУ, МУДРОСТЬ, СЛАВУ И БЛАГОСЛОВЕНИЕ
translations.es: DE RECIBIR PODER, SABIDURÍA, GLORIA Y BENDICIÓN

e1ba61ab-4bae-47dc-baa9-f847169c5c6c.translation: forever and ever and say amen

translations.en: forever and ever and say amen
translations.es: POR LOS SIGLOS DE LOS SIGLOS, AMÉN

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: Like a plant without roots, like a flower without colour
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.originalText: כמו צמח בלי שורש פרח בלי צבע
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.transliteration: Kmo tzemach bli shoresh perach bli tzeva

translations.en: Like a plant without roots, like a flower without colour
translations.cs: JAKO ROSTLINA BEZ KOŘENŮ, JAKO KVĚT BEZ BARVY
translations.ru: КАК РОСТОК БЕЗ КОРНЕЙ, КАК ЦВЕТОК БЕЗ КРАСОК
translations.es: COMO UNA PLANTA SIN RAÍCES, COMO UNA FLOR SIN COLOR

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: so I am without You, Lord.

translations.en: so I am without You, Lord.
translations.ru: ТАК И Я БЕЗ ТЕБЯ, БЕЗ ТЕБЯ
translations.es: ASÍ SOY YO SIN TI, SIN TI

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: For You Lord are the source of life.

translations.en: For You Lord are the source of life.
translations.cs: NEBOŤ TY, PANE, JSI PRAMEN ŽIVOTA
translations.es: PORQUE TÚ, SEÑOR, ERES LA FUENTE DE VIDA

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: In Your light we see light.

translations.en: In Your light we see light.
translations.cs: V TVÉM SVĚTLE VIDÍME SVĚTLO, Ó BOŽE
translations.ru: ВО СВЕТЕ ТВОЁМ МЫ ВИДИМ СВЕТ, О БОЖЕ
translations.es: EN TU LUZ VEMOS LA LUZ, OH DIOS

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: You are living water to all who thirst.
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.originalText: מים חיים אתה לכל הצמאים X2
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.transliteration: Mayim chayim ata lechol hatzmeim X2

translations.en: You are living water to all who thirst.
translations.cs: JSI ŽIVÁ VODA PRO VŠECHNY ŽÍZNIVÉ
translations.ru: ВОДА ЖИВАЯ ТЫ ДЛЯ ВСЕХ ЖАЖДУЩИХ
translations.es: AGUA VIVA ERES TÚ PARA TODOS LOS SEDIENTOS X2

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: Like a vessel without oil, like a broken vessel
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.originalText: כמו כד בלי שמן כלי שבור
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.transliteration: Kmo kad bli shemen kli shavur

translations.en: Like a vessel without oil, like a broken vessel
translations.cs: JAKO NÁDOBA BEZ OLEJE, JAKO ROZBITÁ NÁDOBA
translations.ru: КАК СОСУД БЕЗ МАСЛА, КАК РАЗБИТЫЙ СОСУД
translations.es: COMO UN CÁNTARO SIN ACEITE, COMO UN VASO QUEBRADO

translations.en: so I am without You
translations.ru: ТАК И Я, ГОСПОДИ, БЕЗ ТЕБЯ, БЕЗ ТЕБЯ
translations.es: ASÍ SOY YO, SEÑOR, SIN TI, SIN TI

a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.translation: Like a heart of stone, like a dark spirit
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.originalText: עם לב של אבן רוח קהה
a503be79-7d30-43f7-86b4-294ff2111ead.transliteration: Yim lev shel even, ruach kehaa

translations.en: Like a heart of stone, like a dark spirit
translations.cs: SE SRDCEM Z KAMENE, S OTUPĚLÝM DUCHEM
translations.ru: С КАМЕННЫМ СЕРДЦЕМ, С УГАСШИМ ДУХОМ
translations.es: CON UN CORAZÓN DE PIEDRA, UN ESPÍRITU APAGADO

translations.en: so I am without You
translations.ru: ТАК И Я, ГОСПОДИ, БЕЗ ТЕБЯ, БЕЗ ТЕБЯ
translations.es: ASÍ SOY YO, SEÑOR, SIN TI, SIN TI

3a1313a7-1112-4f64-9821-458de8c6dd04.translation: כל ברך תכרע וכל לשון תודה שישוע הוא אדון
3a1313a7-1112-4f64-9821-458de8c6dd04.originalText: הוא, הוא, מלך המלכים, אדון האדונים, מושיע העולם
3a1313a7-1112-4f64-9821-458de8c6dd04.transliteration: הוא, הוא שם מעל כל שם ושמו עמנואל, גדול מעל כולם

translations.en: כל ברך תכרע וכל לשון תודה שישוע הוא אדון
translations.cs: ON JE KRÁL KRÁLŮ, PÁN PÁNŮ, SPASITEL SVĚTA
translations.ru: ОН, ОН, ЦАРЬ ЦАРЕЙ, ГОСПОДЬ ГОСПОДСТВУЮЩИХ, СПАСИТЕЛЬ МИРА
translations.es: ÉL ES, ÉL ES, REY DE REYES, SEÑOR DE SEÑORES, SALVADOR DEL MUNDO

3a1313a7-1112-4f64-9821-458de8c6dd04.originalText: כל ברך תכרע וכל לשון תודה, ישוע מלך,

translations.cs: KAŽDÉ KOLENO SE SKLONÍ A KAŽDÝ JAZYK VYZNÁ, JEŠUA JE PÁN
translations.ru: ВСЯКОЕ КОЛЕНО ПРЕКЛОНИТСЯ И ВСЯКИЙ ЯЗЫК ИСПОВЕДАЕТ, ИИСУС — ЦАРЬ
translations.es: TODA RODILLA SE DOBLARÁ Y TODA LENGUA CONFESARÁ, JESÚS ES SEÑOR

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: Treasures will not last for ever
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.originalText: אוצרות, לא יהיו כאן עד הנצח
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.transliteration: otzarot lo yehiyu kan ad ha'netzakh

translations.en: Treasures will not last for ever
translations.es: LOS TESOROS NO DURARÁN PARA SIEMPRE

translations.en: And pleasures fade away
translations.es: Y LOS PLACERES SE DESVANECEN

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: Riches will not fill the emptiness
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.originalText: עושר לא, ימלא את החסר בי
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.transliteration: osher lo yemale et ha'khaser bi

translations.en: Riches will not fill the emptiness
translations.ru: БОГАТСТВО НЕ ЗАПОЛНИТ ПУСТОТУ ВО МНЕ
translations.es: LAS RIQUEZAS NO LLENARÁN EL VACÍO EN MÍ

translations.en: I choose you
translations.es: YO TE ELIJO A TI

translations.en: You are my portion
translations.es: TÚ ERES MI PORCIÓN

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: My cup overflows, my cup is full

translations.en: My cup overflows, my cup is full
translations.cs: MŮJ KALICH PŘETÉKÁ, MŮJ KALICH JE PLNÝ
translations.ru: ЧАША МОЯ ПЕРЕПОЛНЕНА, ЧАША МОЯ ПОЛНА
translations.es: MI COPA REBOSA, MI COPA ESTÁ LLENA

translations.en: You're exactly what I need
translations.es: ERES EXACTAMENTE LO QUE NECESITO

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: I have no worries My cup is full

translations.en: I have no worries My cup is full
translations.cs: NEMÁM STAROSTI, MŮJ KALICH JE PLNÝ
translations.ru: НЕТ У МЕНЯ ЗАБОТ, ЧАША МОЯ ПОЛНА
translations.es: NO TENGO PREOCUPACIÓN, MI COPA ESTÁ LLENA

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: I can't be satisfied with what I have
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.originalText: אני לא יכול להסתפק במה שיש לי
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.transliteration: ani lo yakhol le'histapek be ma she'yesh li

translations.en: I can't be satisfied with what I have
translations.cs: NEMOHU SE SPOKOJIT S TÍM, CO MÁM
translations.ru: Я НЕ МОГУ ДОВОЛЬСТВОВАТЬСЯ ТЕМ, ЧТО ИМЕЮ
translations.es: NO PUEDO CONFORMARME CON LO QUE TENGO

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: When all the good is in You

translations.en: When all the good is in You
translations.cs: KDYŽ VŠECHNO DOBRÉ JE V TOBĚ
translations.es: CUANDO TODO LO BUENO ESTÁ EN TI

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: I am convinced I won't find another like you
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.originalText: אני משוכנע, לא אמצא עוד אחד כמוך
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.transliteration: ani meshukhna lo emtza od ekhad kamokha

translations.en: I am convinced I won't find another like you
translations.cs: JSEM PŘESVĚDČEN, ŽE NENAJDU DALŠÍHO JAKO TY
translations.ru: Я УБЕЖДЁН, НЕ НАЙДУ ДРУГОГО, КАК ТЫ
translations.es: ESTOY CONVENCIDO, NO ENCONTRARÉ OTRO COMO TÚ

translations.en: I choose You
translations.es: YO TE ELIJO A TI

translations.en: It will never end
translations.es: NUNCA SE ACABARÁ

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: It's always free, there's enough for everyone
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.originalText: תמיד חינם יש מספיק עבור כולם
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.transliteration: tamid khinam yesh maspik avur kulam

translations.en: It's always free, there's enough for everyone
translations.cs: VŽDY ZDARMA, JE DOST PRO VŠECHNY
translations.es: SIEMPRE ES GRATIS, HAY SUFICIENTE PARA TODOS

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: Come let's sit here at the table

translations.en: Come let's sit here at the table
translations.es: VENGAN, SENTÉMONOS AQUÍ A LA MESA

1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.translation: He is waiting, there is space for everyone
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.originalText: הוא מחכה יש מקום בשביל כולם
1501db16-74bf-4e0f-8559-84f14f74e145.transliteration: hu mekhake yesh makom bishvil kulam

translations.en: He is waiting, there is space for everyone

translations.es: QUE NO ES CORTO PARA SALVAR

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: father Let us see You the one whO IS ENTHRONED OUR praise
0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.originalText: אבא תן לנו לראות, יושב התהילות
0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.transliteration: aba ten lanu lirot yoshev ha'tehilot

translations.en: father Let us see You the one whO IS ENTHRONED OUR praise
translations.cs: OTČE, DEJ NÁM TĚ SPATŘIT, JENŽ TRŮNÍŠ NAD CHVÁLAMI
translations.ru: ОТЕЦ, ДАЙ НАМ УВИДЕТЬ ТЕБЯ, ВОССЕДАЮЩИЙ НА ХВАЛАХ
translations.es: PADRE DÉJANOS VERTE, TÚ QUE ESTÁS ENTRONADO EN NUESTRA ALABANZA

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: Not to us but unto You, the battle belongs to you
0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.originalText: לא לנו כי לך, לך המלחמה
0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.transliteration: lo lanu ki lekha, lekha ha'milkhama

translations.en: Not to us but unto You, the battle belongs to you
translations.cs: NE NÁM, ALE TOBĚ, TOBĚ PATŘÍ TEN BOJ
translations.ru: НЕ НАМ, НО ТЕБЕ, ТЕБЕ ПРИНАДЛЕЖИТ БИТВА
translations.es: NO A NOSOTROS SINO A TI, LA BATALLA ES TUYA

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: We've seen what happens when you intervene

translations.en: We've seen what happens when you intervene
translations.cs: VIDĚLI JSME, CO SE DĚJE, KDYŽ TY ZASÁHNEŠ
translations.ru: МЫ ВИДЕЛИ, ЧТО БЫВАЕТ, КОГДА ТЫ ВМЕШИВАЕШЬСЯ
translations.es: HEMOS VISTO LO QUE PASA CUANDO TÚ INTERVIENES

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: the victory is yours, all the power is yours

translations.en: the victory is yours, all the power is yours
translations.cs: TVÉ JE VÍTĚZSTVÍ, TVÁ JE VŠECHNA MOCI
translations.es: TUYA ES LA VICTORIA, TUYO ES TODO EL PODER

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: With our eyes lifted high, we sing thanks to You
0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.originalText: עם עיננו נשואות, שרים לך תודה
0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.transliteration: eim eineinu nesuot sharim lekha toda

translations.en: With our eyes lifted high, we sing thanks to You
translations.cs: S OČIMA POZVEDNUTÝMA ZPÍVÁME TI DÍKY
translations.ru: С ГЛАЗАМИ, ПОДНЯТЫМИ ВВЫСЬ, ПОЁМ ТЕБЕ БЛАГОДАРЕНИЕ
translations.es: CON NUESTROS OJOS EN ALTO, TE CANTAMOS GRATITUD

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: Not by might, not by power

translations.en: Not by might, not by power
translations.es: NO CON EJÉRCITO NI CON FUERZA

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: But by The spirit of the Lord of hosts

translations.en: But by The spirit of the Lord of hosts
translations.es: SINO CON EL ESPÍRITU DEL SEÑOR DE LOS EJÉRCITOS

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: We will not fear, we will continue to trust

translations.en: We will not fear, we will continue to trust
translations.cs: NEBUDEME SE BÁT, BUDEME DÁL DŮVĚŘOVAT
translations.es: NO TEMEREMOS, SEGUIREMOS CONFIANDO

0787cb5b-9e87-4d6b-beae-c45ee7acd8e8.translation: Keeper of the covenant, fulfiller of the promises

translations.en: Keeper of the covenant, fulfiller of the promises
translations.es: GUARDIÁN DEL PACTO, CUMPLIDOR DE LAS PROMESAS

dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.translation: When the pain is deep I'll call on You

translations.en: When the pain is deep I'll call on You
translations.cs: KDYŽ JE BOLEST HLUBOKÁ, VOLÁM K TOBĚ
translations.ru: КОГДА БОЛЬ ГЛУБОКА, Я ВОЗЗОВУ К ТЕБЕ

translations.en: When I'm far I'll return to Your love
translations.cs: KDYŽ JSEM DALEKO, VRÁTÍM SE K TVÉ LÁSCE

translations.es: Y CUANDO ESTOY LEJOS VOLVERÉ A TU AMOR

translations.en: For only You know me
translations.es: PORQUE SOLO TÚ ME CONOCES

translations.en: Inside and out
translations.es: POR DENTRO Y POR FUERA

dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.translation: I'll trust in You my Redeemer

translations.en: I'll trust in You my Redeemer
translations.es: EN TI CONFIARÉ, MI REDENTOR

dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.translation: When the waves are high i'll look to You

translations.ru: КОГДА ВОЛНЫ ВЫСОКИ, Я ПОСМОТРЮ НА ТЕБЯ
translations.es: CUANDO LAS OLAS SON ALTAS MIRARÉ A TI

translations.en: When I don't understand
translations.es: Y CUANDO NO ENTIENDO

translations.en: I'll lean on Your grace
translations.es: ME APOYARÉ EN TU GRACIA

dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.translation: for Only in You I have hope, my salvation
dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.originalText: כי רק בך יש לי תקווה, ישועתי
dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.transliteration: ki rak bekha yesh li tikva, Yeshuati

translations.en: for Only in You I have hope, my salvation

translations.ru: ВЕДЬ ТОЛЬКО В ТЕБЕ ЕСТЬ НАДЕЖДА, МОЁ СПАСЕНИЕ
translations.es: PORQUE SOLO EN TI TENGO ESPERANZA, MI SALVACIÓN

dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.translation: I'll trust in You my Savior

translations.en: I'll trust in You my Savior
translations.es: EN TI CONFIARÉ, MI SALVADOR

translations.en: Immanuel, You're always with me
translations.es: EMANUEL, TÚ SIEMPRE ESTÁS CONMIGO

translations.ru: ДОБРЫЙ ПАСТЫРЬ, ВСЕГДА РЯДОМ СО МНОЙ
translations.es: EL BUEN PASTOR, SIEMPRE AQUÍ A MI LADO

translations.en: Faithful father
translations.es: PADRE FIEL

translations.en: Keeper of every promise
translations.es: CUMPLIDOR DE CADA PROMESA

translations.en: I'll trust in You
translations.es: CONFIARÉ EN TI

translations.en: Hope is not lost yet
translations.es: LA ESPERANZA NO SE HA PERDIDO

translations.en: I'm not alone
translations.es: NO ESTOY SOLO

dacb5f21-4a52-4dd9-99b7-2ba0c3c3c517.translation: There's an end for every desert

translations.en: There's an end for every desert

translations.en: I'll holding onto You
translations.es: YO ME AFERRO A TI

9a617c35-69a2-4573-8a97-533ba96845cc.translation: Blessing and honor, glory and power

translations.ru: БЛАГОСЛОВЕНИЕ И ЧЕСТЬ, СЛАВА И СИЛА
translations.es: BENDICIÓN Y HONOR, GLORIA Y PODER

9a617c35-69a2-4573-8a97-533ba96845cc.translation: be unto the ancient of days

translations.en: be unto the ancient of days
translations.es: SEAN PARA EL ANCIANO DE DÍAS

translations.es: DECLARARÁ TU GLORIA

9a617c35-69a2-4573-8a97-533ba96845cc.originalText: שלטונך לא ימוט לעולם, עתיק היומין

9a617c35-69a2-4573-8a97-533ba96845cc.translation: sing unto the ancient of days

9a617c35-69a2-4573-8a97-533ba96845cc.translation: None can compare to Your matchless worth

translations.es: NADA SE COMPARA A TU VALOR INCOMPARABLE

9a617c35-69a2-4573-8a97-533ba96845cc.translation: sing unto the ancient of days

translations.en: sing unto the ancient of days

translations.es: TE ADORAMOS, TE ADORAMOS

9bc28af4-b594-42ca-84fc-289f6168704c.translation: We worship You, we worship You

translations.es: TE ADORAMOS, TE ADORAMOS

translations.es: TE ADORAMOS, TE ADORAMOS

9bc28af4-b594-42ca-84fc-289f6168704c.translation: We worship You, we worship You

translations.en: We worship You, we worship You
translations.ru: МЫ СЛАВИМ ТЕБЯ, МЫ СЛАВИМ ТЕБЯ
translations.es: TE ADORAMOS, TE ADORAMOS

9bc28af4-b594-42ca-84fc-289f6168704c.translation: We worship You, we worship You

translations.ru: МЫ СЛАВИМ ТЕБЯ, МЫ СЛАВИМ ТЕБЯ
translations.es: TE ADORAMOS, TE ADORAMOS

translations.es: SANTO, SANTO, SANTO

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.transliteration: shevakh ashir lo bein eim tov li o ra

translations.en: I'll praise when I feel it I'LL PRAISE WHEN i DON'T

translations.ru: ХВАЛУ ВОСПОЮ ЕМУ, ХОРОШО МНЕ ИЛИ ПЛОХО
translations.es: ALABARÉ CUANDO ME SIENTA BIEN, ALABARÉ CUANDO NO

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.translation: I'll praise 'cause i know YOU'RE STILLIN CONTROL

translations.en: I'll praise 'cause i know YOU'RE STILLIN CONTROL

translations.es: ALABARÉ PORQUE SÉ QUE TÚ TIENES EL CONTROL

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.translation: Because my praise is a weapon IT'S MORE THAN A SOUND
9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.originalText: שבח הוא נשק ולא סתם מילים
9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.transliteration: shevakh hu neshek ve'lo stam milim

translations.en: Because my praise is a weapon IT'S MORE THAN A SOUND

translations.ru: ХВАЛА — ЭТО ОРУЖИЕ, НЕ ПРОСТО СЛОВА
translations.es: PORQUE MI ALABANZA ES UN ARMA, ES MÁS QUE PALABRAS

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.translation: Oh my praise is a shout THAT BRINGS JERICHO DOWN

translations.ru: В ХВАЛЕ ВОСКЛИКНЕМ — И ПАДУТ ТВЕРДЫНИ
translations.es: MI ALABANZA ES UN GRITO QUE DERRUMBA A JERICÓ

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.translation: As long as I'm breathing

translations.en: As long as I'm breathing
translations.es: MIENTRAS HAYA ALIENTO EN MÍ

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.translation: Praise the Lord

translations.en: Praise the Lord

9751938a-64f3-4fe2-926b-285ac07cf927.translation: I won't be quiet my god is alive

translations.en: Again, You've showed up
translations.es: OTRA VEZ, OTRA VEZ LLEGASTE

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: To the place where I was

translations.es: AL LUGAR DONDE YO ESTABA

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: To the place wherefrom I've called You

translations.es: AL LUGAR DESDE DONDE TE LLAMÉ

translations.en: Again, You havent rejected me
translations.es: OTRA VEZ, NO ME RECHAZASTE

translations.en: after I went far
translations.ru: ПОСЛЕ ТОГО КАК Я УШЁЛ ДАЛЕКО
translations.es: DESPUÉS DE QUE ME ALEJÉ

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: and then asked to come back to Your house

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: Again I am here, overwhelmed by You

translations.en: Searching for words to speak
translations.es: BUSCANDO PALABRAS QUE DECIR

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: But my heart is filled with awe

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: How come You havent given up

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: Raising me and calling me loved

translations.en: again and again
translations.es: UNA Y OTRA VEZ

translations.en: Every time you forgive me
translations.es: CADA VEZ TÚ ME PERDONAS

translations.en: Every time you love me
translations.es: CADA VEZ TÚ ME AMAS

translations.en: Never forgetting me,
translations.es: NUNCA ME OLVIDAS

translations.en: and not remembering my sins

translations.en: I will always praise You,

translations.es: SIEMPRE SOLO A TI TE ALABARÉ

b1c2a4a2-d453-4c90-8640-7b5c3d77f2e3.translation: and You've healed me, I wont hurt no more

de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.transliteration: Ulai i'hiye kal ulay kashe

de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.translation: And no one knows what will happen today

de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.transliteration: Ve'ein yodea ma hayom yikrea

translations.en: And no one knows what will happen today
translations.cs: A NIKDO NEVÍ, CO SE DNES STANE
translations.ru: И НИКТО НЕ ЗНАЕТ, ЧТО СЛУЧИТСЯ СЕГОДНЯ

de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.translation: But I know you and have no doubt about you
de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.originalText: אך אני מכיר אותך ואין לי ספק בך
de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.transliteration: Ach ani makir otcha, ve'ein li safek becha

translations.en: But I know you and have no doubt about you

translations.ru: НО Я ЗНАЮ ТЕБЯ И НЕ СОМНЕВАЮСЬ В ТЕБЕ

de754407-46e5-4b12-9449-3893e62d70a4.originalText: כי האמת שלך גוברת על כל עובדה
